HSRMod:PomPomBlessing.NAME: PomPom Blessing
HSRMod:PomPomBlessing.FLAVOR: "Ta-da! Here's to the future expeditions we'll be experiencing together!"
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle start, gain [E] [E], gain #yIntangible . NL After you use a card, gain #b20 #yhsrmod:Charge . #yCharge will be kept between battles. NL At the end of turn, you can choose to use 20 #yCharge per card to retain cards. NL #rWould #rsomehow #rsave #ryou #rfrom #rdanger...
Retain (each costs 20 Charge)
Choose one crew member to sacrifice
I don't want to… be alone…
This… can't be…
That's… my final lesson… for you…
Live on, kid…

HSRMod:GalacticBat.NAME: Galactic Bat
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies have #yToughness, deal damage to reduce it. NL When #yToughness is reduced to 0, apply #yBroken, deal break damage and an #yeffect #yof #ybreaking depending on the element type of the damage. NL Right click in game to view more detail.

Enemies have #yhsrmod:Toughness, deal damage to reduce it. NL When #yToughness is reduced to 0, apply #yhsrmod:Broken, deal #ybreak-damage and an #yhsrmod:effect-of-breaking depending on the element type of the damage. NL Right click in game to close detailed info.

HSRMod:WaxOfElation.FLAVOR: It is said that stamping with this Sealing Wax will attract a glimpse from the corresponding Aeon from across space and time - Aha is watching you!
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the chance of appearing of "Elation" cards. Right click in Neow's room to ban paths.
Increase the chance of appearing of "Elation" cards. Banned paths: %s.

HSRMod:WaxOfRemembrance.FLAVOR: It is said that stamping with this Sealing Wax will attract a glimpse from the corresponding Aeon from across space and time - IX is watching you!

HSRMod:TrailblazeTimer.NAME: Trailblaze Timer
HSRMod:TrailblazeTimer.FLAVOR: It broke countless times and underwent endless repairs. Its former shape was no longer discernible, and only the stilled sharp hands were pointing ever forward.
DESCRIPTIONS: Future card rewards have #b1 more cards to choose from. NL Right click in Neow's room to ban paths.
Future card rewards have #b1 more cards to choose from. Banned paths: %s.
Choose %d paths to ban

HSRMod:TheAshblazingGrandDuke.NAME: The Ashblazing GrandDuke
HSRMod:TheAshblazingGrandDuke.FLAVOR: The elegant fire demon was born in the most fiery of all fires, and believes Destruction to be the supreme glory bestowed upon Fetora.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your starter strike cards are considered #yhsrmod:Follow-Up cards, and will #yFollow-Up upon #yhsrmod:break.

HSRMod:IronCavalryAgainstTheScourge.NAME: Iron Cavalry Against The Scourge
HSRMod:IronCavalryAgainstTheScourge.FLAVOR: Until the flames are completely extinguished, until the insectoids that blot out the sky turn into ashen black earth, until no one remains alive — such a daily routine would continue...
DESCRIPTIONS: Your starter strike cards gain #yExhaust , and their #yhsrmod:Toughness reduction value + #b3 .

HSRMod:PrisonerInDeepConfinement.NAME: Prisoner In Deep Confinement
HSRMod:PrisonerInDeepConfinement.FLAVOR: "Borisin Brood Lord, with you come war and a scourge upon all worlds. Your sentence is to be eternally detained and imprisoned, never to be reborn."
DESCRIPTIONS: Your starter strike cards gain #yEthereal , and after being exhausted, apply #b1 stack of #yhsrmod:DoT to all enemies. NL You are immune to #yThorn damage outside of your turn.

HSRMod:KnightOfPurityPalace.NAME: Knight of Purity Palace
HSRMod:KnightOfPurityPalace.FLAVOR: "Henceforth, I will become a witch, and you will return to being a devil." Safina could not deny the validity of Vanira's statement.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon gain, all starter defend card gain #yInnate, and its Block + #b2 . NL When shuffling your deck, gain all innate cards.

HSRMod:MusketeerOfWildWheat.NAME: Musketeer of WildWheat
HSRMod:MusketeerOfWildWheat.FLAVOR: Waking up, there would be traces of damp tears on Oakley's felt hat. As a child, she learned how to shoot a gun only because she had wanted her father's handsome and stylish hat.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgrade 1 starter strike upon gain. When using starter strike, draw 1.

HSRMod:PasserbyOfWanderingCloud.NAME: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
HSRMod:PasserbyOfWanderingCloud.FLAVOR: If life could be deemed as a continuous journey, then the unnamed wishes to step over the pool of blood made of all whom he deeply resented before reaching his own end.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at start of your turn, exhaust [E] if the number of start strike in your hand is less than 2.

HSRMod:TheWindSoaringValorous.NAME: The Wind Soaring Valorous
HSRMod:TheWindSoaringValorous.FLAVOR: She quickened her pace, barefoot and agile, with the girl closely chasing after her. Or perhaps, they were both chasing after each other.
DESCRIPTIONS: All upgraded starter strike becomes AoE at start of battle. When using starter strike, gain #b40 [hsrmod:chargeIcon] .

HSRMod:MasterOfDreamMachinations.NAME: Master of Dream Machinations
HSRMod:MasterOfDreamMachinations.FLAVOR: The more people want to discover the truth, the more they will be blinded by lies... Amidst the thousands of legends and rumors, this superstar of the festivities will only leave his footprints, but never his face
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #yAstral #yExpress upon gain. You can right click this relic in shop to use some gold to transform a card.
Transform a card

HSRMod:March7th.NAME: March 7th's last words
HSRMod:March7th.FLAVOR: I don't want to… be alone…

HSRMod:Danheng.NAME: Danheng's last words
HSRMod:Danheng.FLAVOR: All remains as it did yesterday…

HSRMod:Himeko.NAME: Himeko's last words
HSRMod:Himeko.FLAVOR: She reborns from the flames, she smiles in the fire.

HSRMod:WarpingCompoundEye.NAME: 跃迁复眼
HSRMod:WarpingCompoundEye.FLAVOR: 它的光线能率先跃迁至前方的星系，带回新世界的信息。
DESCRIPTIONS: 在选择奖励牌时，强化其中所有普通品质的卡牌。

HSRMod:CasketOfInaccuracy.NAME: Casket of Inaccuracy
HSRMod:CasketOfInaccuracy.FLAVOR: Each side of this casket can be opened, but the spaces that should overlap do not, and due to this unique property, you cannot be sure what will happen when you open it. It is not recommended to store anything inside.
DESCRIPTIONS: When picked up, you can add a card to your deck.
Casket of Inaccuracy!

HSRMod:AmbergrisCheese.NAME: Ambergris Cheese
HSRMod:AmbergrisCheese.FLAVOR: That one world in the cosmos is still stuffed full of delicious cheese to this day, packed so tight that not a single centimeter of space is left.
DESCRIPTIONS: After battle, restore #b2 HP.

HSRMod:TheParchmentThatAlwaysEats.NAME: The Parchment That Always Eats
HSRMod:TheParchmentThatAlwaysEats.FLAVOR: In Herta's Curio list, the hazard level of this parchment is marked as extremely high.
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle starts, deal damage to all enemies equal to #b10% of their max HP.

HSRMod:TheDoctorsRobe.NAME: The Doctors Robe
HSRMod:TheDoctorsRobe.FLAVOR: This robe was reportedly once owned by member 4 of the Genius Society, Dr. Primitive, and supposedly had incredible powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle starts, gain #b120 #yhsrmod:Charge .

HSRMod:SocietyTicket.NAME: 俱乐部券
HSRMod:SocietyTicket.FLAVOR: 事实是，6以后的每位会员都确实使用过「俱乐部券」，可时间从来没有重合过哪怕一次。
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗结束后，获得的金币数提高 #b33 %。

HSRMod:FaithBond.NAME: 信仰债券
HSRMod:FaithBond.FLAVOR: 但一代又一代的「你」汇聚起来，终将拥有守护整个宇宙的力量。
DESCRIPTIONS: 商店区域的药水和奇物商品价格减少 #b33 %。

HSRMod:RecordFromBeyondTheSky.NAME: Record From Beyond The Sky
HSRMod:RecordFromBeyondTheSky.FLAVOR: The last Phonograph of Order was destroyed in the Emperor's War, and now the thick layer of dust on the records protests against that soundless era.
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle starts, gain #b1 stack of #yIntangible and #b1 stack of #yArtifact.

HSRMod:EntropicDie.NAME: Entropic Die
HSRMod:EntropicDie.FLAVOR: Entropic Dice are common in the universe and cause countless tiny but malevolent disturbances.
DESCRIPTIONS: When gaining, randomly upgrade #b2 cards.

HSRMod:AngelTypeIOUDispenser.NAME: Angel-Type IOU Dispenser
HSRMod:AngelTypeIOUDispenser.FLAVOR: A debt dispenser distributed by the Business Consolidation Department of the Interastral Peace Corporation.
DESCRIPTIONS: After battle, you cannot gain any gold. After this effect triggers #b5 times, this relic is destroyed, your current gold is doubled, and the relic is destroyed.

HSRMod:BlackHoleTrap.NAME: 黑洞之阱
HSRMod:BlackHoleTrap.FLAVOR: 星系中时空曲率最大的地方曾出现疑似「虚无」星神的巨影。
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗结束后，根据你生命值大于 #b80 %的数量，获得等量金币。

HSRMod:RubertEmpireMechanicalCogwheel.NAME: 鲁珀特帝国机械齿轮
HSRMod:RubertEmpireMechanicalCogwheel.FLAVOR: 鲁珀特二世自称继承了天才俱乐部500.07帝皇鲁珀特的记忆。
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入战斗时，获得 #b50 金币，然后若你的金币数大于 #b500 ，则失去所有金币，该遗物损毁。 NL 若同时携带全部鲁珀特帝国机械系列遗物，将引发反有机方程的局域共鸣。

HSRMod:RubertEmpireMechanicalLever.NAME: 鲁珀特帝国机械杠杆
HSRMod:RubertEmpireMechanicalLever.FLAVOR: 鲁珀特二世自称继承了天才俱乐部 #b1 . #b07 帝皇鲁珀特的记忆。
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入？时，随机选择一张牌，若其未升级，则升级之，否则该遗物损毁。 NL 若同时携带全部鲁珀特帝国机械系列遗物，将引发反有机方程的局域共鸣。

HSRMod:RubertEmpireMechanicalPiston.NAME: 鲁珀特帝国机械活塞
HSRMod:RubertEmpireMechanicalPiston.FLAVOR: 鲁珀特二世自称继承了天才俱乐部 #b2 . #b07 帝皇鲁珀特的记忆。
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入休息处时，获得 #b2 个遗物，随机失去 #b1 个不为初始遗物的遗物，若以此法失去自身，则失去所有遗物。 NL 若同时携带全部鲁珀特帝国机械系列遗物，将引发反有机方程的局域共鸣。

HSRMod:VileMechanicalSatellite900.NAME: 邪恶机械卫星#900
HSRMod:VileMechanicalSatellite900.FLAVOR: 它们是典型的反有机文明，对待有机生命手腕狠辣，而其中尤以卫星# #b900 最为邪恶。
DESCRIPTIONS: 商店区域的所有商品价格降低 #b20 %。

HSRMod:PriceOfPeace.NAME: Price Of Peace
HSRMod:PriceOfPeace.FLAVOR: People believed this era of prosperity would never end — until the day the even more terrifying Interstellar Energy War lifted its curtains.
DESCRIPTIONS: When entering a shop, gain #b100 gold.

HSRMod:MysteriousMagnetism.NAME: 「神秘」磁力
HSRMod:MysteriousMagnetism.FLAVOR: 为对抗「智识」的确定性，谜语人曾在不确定领域做出诸多努力。
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入新楼层时，获得 #b50 金币。战斗胜利后，失去 #b50 金币。

HSRMod:ShatterboneBlade.NAME: 断骨剑
HSRMod:ShatterboneBlade.FLAVOR: 多年以后，每每在私下讲起森林里的遭遇时，少年都会痛哭流涕，并对那人面兽心的卡耶尔大骂不止。
DESCRIPTIONS: 第二章及之前，受到伤害提高 #b20 %；第三章及之后，受到伤害降低 #b20 %。

HSRMod:BeaconColoringPaste.NAME: 信标着色剂
HSRMod:BeaconColoringPaste.FLAVOR: 它的发明者乃是一位画技卓绝的无名客。
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗胜利选择卡牌时，升级其中 #b1 张。

HSRMod:SuperOverlordSpinningTop.NAME: Super Overlord Spinning Top
HSRMod:SuperOverlordSpinningTop.FLAVOR: There is a reason behind the creation of every rule in the Intelligentsia Guild.
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle starts, gain #b1 stack of #yhsrmod:Break-Effect. At start of the first turn, removes #b50% of enemy's #yhsrmod:Toughness.

HSRMod:FortuneGlue.NAME: 福灵胶
HSRMod:FortuneGlue.FLAVOR: 运气是一种能力吗？也许；运气能够被改变吗？黑塔认为能。
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗结束后，出现的牌是稀有品质的概率提高 #b100 %，触发 #b1 次后该遗物损毁。

HSRMod:ShiningTrapezohedronDie.NAME: Shining Trapezohedron Die
HSRMod:ShiningTrapezohedronDie.FLAVOR: That is how the famous Shining Trapezohedron Die Paradox came to be — You cannot prove something that cannot be proven.
DESCRIPTIONS: When gaining, regain all non-starter relics.

HSRMod:GoldCoinOfDiscord.NAME: Gold Coin Of Discord
HSRMod:GoldCoinOfDiscord.FLAVOR: The representative of the IPC would usually shrug at these statements, then casually destroy the root of that planet's commercial system — it is usually based on gold.
DESCRIPTIONS: When entering a new floor, gain #b3 % of your current gold.

HSRMod:SilverCoinOfDiscord.NAME: Silver Coin Of Discord
HSRMod:SilverCoinOfDiscord.FLAVOR: An ingenious plan was born: Since silver's exceptional malleability allowed it to be stretched from one gram into yards of antenna, a researcher devised a Silver Coin of Discord that split itself infinitely, dramatically increasing the quantity of silver available to meet demands.
DESCRIPTIONS: When gaining, gain #b50 % of your current gold.

HSRMod:ShatteredStarBait.NAME: 碎星芳饵
HSRMod:ShatteredStarBait.FLAVOR: 在黄昏战争前，混沌星云膨胀所产生的爆炸碎屑可以作为饵料，其特有的宇宙尘埃芳香能够吸引到古兽前来觅食。
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗开始时，获得 #b1 层 敏捷 。你在选择下一层的房间时有 #b1 次机会可以无视当前的路线。

HSRMod:SpaceTimePrism.NAME: Space Time Prism
HSRMod:SpaceTimePrism.FLAVOR: They become diagnosed with fictmemoria, and claim that they saw the enigmatic face of the Aeon Fuli in the prism.
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle starts, upgrade all cards in hand.

HSRMod:CosmicBigLotto.NAME: Cosmic Big Lotto
HSRMod:CosmicBigLotto.FLAVOR: The marketing tactics for the Cosmic Big Lotto, sold by the Interastral Peace Corporation's Marketing Development Department, is as passionate and hot-blooded as Oswaldo Schneider himself.
DESCRIPTIONS: After battle: #b20 % chance to gain an extra relic. #b10 % chance to lose half of your current HP and destroy this relic.

HSRMod:InterastralBigLotto.NAME: Interastral Big Lotto
HSRMod:InterastralBigLotto.FLAVOR: How do you make a business model last? After getting rave reviews for their Cosmic Big Lotto, the Interastral Peace Corporation's Business Consolidation Department put the Interastral Big Lotto on the market.
DESCRIPTIONS: After battle: #b20 % chance to gain an extra card reward. #b10 % chance to lose #b1 random card and destroy this relic.

HSRMod:IllusoryAutomaton.NAME: Illusory Automaton
HSRMod:IllusoryAutomaton.FLAVOR: Could the History Fictionologists themselves be fabrications as well?
DESCRIPTIONS: At turn starts, gain #b4 #yBlock.

HSRMod:ManMadeMeteorite.NAME: 人造陨石球
HSRMod:ManMadeMeteorite.FLAVOR: 陨石球表面坐落着由其复刻的「博识之眼」。
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，重新获得你的所有火漆。

HSRMod:RottingFruitOfTheAlienTree.NAME: 腐化异木果实
HSRMod:RottingFruitOfTheAlienTree.FLAVOR: 他们一人拥抱蜕变，一人当场毙命。
DESCRIPTIONS: 初始有 #b3 次触发次数。回合开始时，若你没有 #y人工制品 ，你获得 #b1 层，然后若不为首回合，你受到 #b5 点伤害。

HSRMod:RobeOfTheBeauty.NAME: Robe Of The Beauty
HSRMod:RobeOfTheBeauty.FLAVOR: The entire universe bowed before the grace of the Knights of Beauty while they still traversed the skies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle starts, for every 100 gold you have, gain #b1 #yStrength .

HSRMod:CavitySystemModel.NAME: Cavity System Model
HSRMod:CavitySystemModel.FLAVOR: "The universe is irregularly shaped, just like a tooth!"
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，失去 #b50 %金币。 NL 战斗结束后，失去 #b50 金币，然后如果金币不足 #b100 ，该遗物损毁。 NL 进入战斗时，对生命值最多的敌方造成 #b10 点伤害，每因为该奇物的效果损失 #b100 金币，额外造成 #b1 次伤害。

HSRMod:Plaguenest.NAME: Plaguenest
HSRMod:Plaguenest.FLAVOR: The Infinite Maze is a labyrinth that is said to be able to lead you to any place in the universe.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn, if you have Curse or Status card in your hand, draw 1, otherwise, lose 1 [E] .

HSRMod:RubertEmpireDifferenceMachine.NAME: 鲁珀特帝国差分机
HSRMod:RubertEmpireDifferenceMachine.FLAVOR: 「如果这就是天才，那世上还是多些蠢人为好。」
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入新楼层时，复制该房间的所有奖励。

HSRMod:ParallelUniverseWalkieTalkie.NAME: Parallel Universe Walkie-Talkie
HSRMod:ParallelUniverseWalkieTalkie.FLAVOR: Apparently, it can detect tiny divergences in space-time shifts, and establish a relationship between the two closest divergence points, allowing information to be passed between them.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yExhaust a card, there is a #b20% chance it is not Exhausted and returned to your hand.

HSRMod:Revitalization310.NAME: Revitalization-310
HSRMod:Revitalization310.FLAVOR: These bizarre ointments start from the patient's cognition and erase the root of the emotion that may give birth to Nihility.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the first turn, add #yEthereal to all cards in hand. When you use a Ethereal card, a random enemy loses #b1 #yStrength.

HSRMod:ChanceJailbreak.NAME: Chance Jailbreak
HSRMod:ChanceJailbreak.FLAVOR: THEIR greatness lies not in THEIR ability to build defenses for the universe, but in creating prisons for those outside the walls.
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle starts, gain all #yInnate cards from deck (these do not count toward your initial hand card). When you use an Innate card, draw #b1 card.

HSRMod:RoadToComets.NAME: Road to Comets
HSRMod:RoadToComets.FLAVOR: A gravitational bridge built through projections on spatial structures, judged by the Intelligentsia Guild as one of the ten thousand most useless inventions in the universe.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, for each card that uses #yhsrmod:Charge, gain #b20 #yCharge, and for each card that was #yretain ed, gain #b3 #yBlock.

HSRMod:DreamdiveCan.NAME: Dreamdive Can
HSRMod:DreamdiveCan.FLAVOR: The survivors fall shiveringly asleep and head into dreams to find the freedom they could not find in reality, just like how it was in yesteryear in the Land of Dreams.
DESCRIPTIONS: At turn starts, choose a card from discard pile to move to the top of draw pile.
Choose a card to move to the top of draw pile

HSRMod:SilentSong.NAME: Silent Song
HSRMod:SilentSong.FLAVOR: They connect to form a crystal plain, as the resonance between their particles sings silent Odes of Harmony, like... ice-cold stones.
DESCRIPTIONS: At turn starts and ends, apply #b1 stacks of #yhsrmod:Frozen to a random enemy.

HSRMod:DignityAndPassion.NAME: Dignity and Passion
HSRMod:DignityAndPassion.FLAVOR: The Interastral Peace Corporation has the final right of interpretation regarding mining work in star zones under their possession. Any illegal mining activities will be viewed as an act of blasphemy that interferes with the Amber Lord's wall construction.
DESCRIPTIONS: At turn ends, gain temp HP equal to #b20% of your lost HP.
